name: Lost in a Lab
description:
Controls:
Right Arrow Key: Move right

Left Arrow Key: Move left

Z: Jump

Move around the enclosed level and try to collect as many Suns as you can. Each time you pick up a Sun, a new one will spawn somewhere in the level. Beware of lightnings and electric charges that can periodically zap and kill you! Also, don't ask me why you are going around collecting miniature Suns.

*Background Music: "Scattered and Lost" from "Celeste Original Soundtrack" by Lena Raine
